columns.name: PropertiesID
columns.description: Auto-incremented primary key for the table

columns.name: ListingID
columns.description: External unique identifier for the property

columns.name: Price
columns.description: Price of the property in CZK

columns.name: P_condition
columns.description: Condition of the property (options: Novostavba, Dobrý, Velmi dobrý, Po rekonstrukci)

columns.name: BuildingType
columns.description: Type of building (options: Cihla, Smíšená, Panel)

columns.name: EnergyEfficiency
columns.description: Energy efficiency class (options: A - Mimořádně úsporná, B - Velmi úsporná, C - Úsporná, D – méně úsporná, E - Nehospodárná, F – velmi nehospodárná, G - Mimořádně nehospodárná)

columns.name: BuildingAge
columns.description: Age of the building (options: Nad 50 let, Nad 50let, Do 10 let, Do 10 let, 10 - 30 let)

columns.name: P_Location
columns.description: Location (options: Klidná cást, Centrum, Okraj, Sídlište, Rušná cást)

columns.name: Heating
columns.description: Type of heating (options: Elektrické, Plynové, Ústrední, Vzdálené)

columns.name: Street
columns.description: Street (options: all streets in Czech Republic in Czech language - e.g. Rímská, Kaštanová)

columns.name: City
columns.description: City (options: all cities in Czech Republic in Czech language - e.g. Praha, Hradec Králové, Pardubice)

columns.name: District
columns.description: District (options: all districs in Czech Republic in Czech language - e.g. Vinor, Kyje, Vinohrady)

columns.name: Region
columns.description: Region (options: all regions (kraj) in Czech Republic in Czech language - e.g. Olomoucký kraj, Jihomoravský kraj, Moravskoslezský kraj)
